event.comment: MomsRising members meet with Sen. Lautenberg's office in Newark. Thanks to Caroline for organizing!
MomsRising members meet with Sen. Bond's office in Kansas City. Thanks to Delia for organizing!
MomsRising.org members meet with Senator Susan Collins' staffer in Portland, Maine. Thanks to Michelle for organizing!
MomsRising members meet with Sen. Kerry's office in Springfield, MA. Thanks to Marya for organizing!
MomsRising members meet with Sen. Feinstein's office in San Diego. Thanks to Roz for organizing!
MomsRising members meet with Sen. Mikulski's office in DC. Thanks to Melissa for organizing!
